comment._content: Simply Awesome .................. Hats off to photographer !!!

comment.author: 61498590@N03
comment._content:
Thanks for visiting. Yes, it is a terrific image. It really highlights the detail and clarity that can be found in an albumen print.

Apparently, this fountain depicts Moses saved from the waters. We've recently discovered that the photograph was made by Fratelli Alinari, which is a photography studio founded in Florence, Italy, in 1852.

comment.authorname: Roma ieri, Roma oggi di Alvaro de Alvariis

comment._content: Wonderful photos! Very nice to see some more recent images of the fountain. Thanks for sharing.
